t_maxobject_attrs Struct Reference

#include <maxobjectbridge.h>

Detailed Description

Cache for information about attributes harvested when the class is created. offset Where in the ObjC class is the memory for this attribute value size How big is the memory needed to hold this attribute value type What is the datatype of this attribute using the standard Max symbol representation for types This structure is used to store attribute information in a hashtab that keeps all of the attr information. The hashtab is keyed on the name of the attribute and stored inside of the relevant t_maxobject_class structure.
